com.unvired.ump.agent

Interface IApplicationSetting

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ApplicationSetting, ApplicationSetting

    public interface IApplicationSetting
extends java.io.Serializable
    IApplicationSetting provides a mechanism that allows process agents to read, delete or set an applications properties.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void deleteApplicationSetting(java.lang.String propertyName)
      Deletes an application property.
      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> findApplicationSetting(java.lang.String keyPattern)
      Finds all application properties that match the specified pattern.
      java.lang.String readApplicationSetting(java.lang.String propertyName)
      Reads an application property.
      void storeApplicationSetting(java.lang.String propertyName, java.lang.String propertyValue, boolean hidden)
      Sets an application property to the specified value.

    • Method Detail

      • storeApplicationSetting

        void storeApplicationSetting(java.lang.String propertyName,
                             java.lang.String propertyValue,
                             boolean hidden)
        Sets an application property to the specified value.
        Parameters:
        propertyName - - Name of the property
        propertyValue - - Value of the property

      • readApplicationSetting

        java.lang.String readApplicationSetting(java.lang.String propertyName)
        Reads an application property.
        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • findApplicationSetting

        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> findApplicationSetting(java.lang.String keyPattern)
        Finds all application properties that match the specified pattern.
        Parameters:
        keyPattern - - Regular expression of the property name
        Returns:
        A map contains (propertyName, propertyValue) value pairs

      • deleteApplicationSetting

        Parameters:
